content.question: Do you have your marriage certificate with you now?
content.originalCertificate: You'll be asked to upload a digital photo of the certificate. You can use your phone to do this if it has a camera.
content.camera: If you don't have your certificate you should save and close your application and return later.
content.certificateTranslation: You must have the original certificate or a certified copy. If it isn't in English, you'll also need to provide a certified translation.

screenHasMarriageCert.required: Select yes if you have your marriage certificate
screenHasMarriageCert.invalid: Select yes if you have your marriage certificate
